name: Macadamia husk spot
symptoms: ['Small dark spots on husk surface', 'Can coalesce into large blemishes', 'May cause premature nut drop']

name: Phytophthora root rot
symptoms: ['Yellowing leaves', 'Wilting', 'Root necrosis', 'Tree death in severe cases']

name: Macadamia nut borer
symptoms: ['Larvae bore into nut', 'Premature nut drop', 'Kernel damage']

name: Macadamia felted coccid
symptoms: ['White felt-like covering on twigs', 'Twig dieback', 'Reduced nut yield']

name: Raceme Blight
column10: 'keep lower portions of windbreaks foliage free']"
